update.sql: create table Hops (id bigint not null auto_increment, formData longtext not null, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, primary key (id));
create unique index ind_hops_student on Hops (studentIdentifier);
create table HopsHistory (id bigint not null auto_increment, date datetime not null, modifier varchar(255) not null, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, primary key (id));

create table HopsSuggestion (id bigint not null auto_increment, courseNumber integer, created datetime not null, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, subject varchar(255) not null, type varchar(255) not null, workspaceEntityId bigint not null, primary key (id));
create unique index ind_hsug_suggestion on HopsSuggestion (studentIdentifier);
create table HopsGoals (id bigint not null auto_increment, goals longtext not null, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, primary key (id));
create unique index ind_hgoa_student on HopsGoals (studentIdentifier);
create table HopsStudentChoice (id bigint not null auto_increment, courseNumber integer, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, subject varchar(255) not null, primary key (id));
create table HopsStudyHours (id bigint not null auto_increment, studyHours integer, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, primary key (id));
create unique index ind_hstu_hours on HopsStudyHours (studentIdentifier);

create table HopsAlternativeStudyOptions (id bigint not null auto_increment, studentIdentifier varchar(255) not null, finnishAsLanguage boolean not null, religionAsEthics boolean not null, primary key (id));
create unique index ind_halt_options on HopsAlternativeStudyOptions (studentIdentifier);
